name: google
description: Google LLC is an American multinational corporation and technology company focusing on online advertising, search engine technology, cloud computing, computer software, quantum computing, e-commerce, consumer electronics, and artificial intelligence (AI)

name: microsoft
description: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational corporation and technology conglomerate headquartered in Redmond, Washington.

name: meta
description: Meta Platforms, Inc., doing business as Meta, and formerly named Facebook, Inc., and The Facebook, Inc., is an American multinational technology conglomerate based in Menlo Park, California.

name: bookmyshow
description: BookMyShow is India's largest entertainment ticketing platform.

name: redbus
description: Redbus is India's largest online bus ticketing platform.

name: cleartax
description: ClearTax offers tax filing, GST, and finance management software for individuals and businesses.

name: naukri
description: Naukri is Indias largest job search portal and part of Info Edge India Ltd.

name: upstox
description: Upstox is a low-cost brokerage firm offering trading services in stocks, commodities, and mutual funds.

name: policybazaar
description: PolicyBazaar is an Indian insurance aggregator and a global financial technology company.

name: cred
description: CRED is a members-only app that rewards users with exclusive offers for paying credit card bills on time.

name: unacademy
description: Unacademy is Indias largest learning platform offering courses for various competitive exams.

name: meesho
description: Meesho is Indias largest social commerce platform.

name: snapdeal
description: Snapdeal is one of Indias largest online marketplaces.

name: oyo
description: OYO is a global platform that empowers entrepreneurs and small businesses with hotels and homes.

name: goibibo
description: Goibibo is an Indian online travel booking platform.

name: ixigo
description: Ixigo is an Indian AI-based travel app for booking flights, trains, and hotels.

name: dunzo
description: Dunzo is an Indian delivery service company providing logistics and personal assistance.

name: browserstack
description: BrowserStack is a cloud web and mobile testing platform.

name: mphasis
description: Mphasis is an IT services company providing infrastructure technology and applications outsourcing services.

name: hexaware
description: Hexaware is a global IT services company specializing in IT, BPO, and consulting services.

name: birlasoft
description: Birlasoft provides enterprise digital solutions and IT services.

name: sonata-software
description: Sonata Software is a global IT services company providing services in digital transformation.
